body: bro this seriously needs a translation

brief summary: The school has a Sex Practice curriculum to combat Japan's declining birthrate. Students can freely form pairs and are required to record themselves having sex and hand in the proof. MC has sex with the first girl, Hinamori. Their teacher, Eri, finds that he's a quick shot and helps him fix his premature ejaculation by having sex with him. He continues with the two girls for a month until Hinamori's friend Yume is introduced who wants to join in. Yume broke up with her boyfriend and wanted to find a new partner. (Doing the Sex Practice gives you credits lol) Then they have a threesome.
art is top tier holy shit
See you guys at the next recommendation pages
i hope this gets fully translated
